amuse.nodes.validator.interfaces
Interface ClassificationQualityMetricCalculatorInterface

All Superinterfaces:
MetricCalculatorInterface
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbsoluteError, Accuracy, ClassificationQualityMetricCalculator, DiscriminantPower, FalseNegatives, FalsePositives, FMeasure, GeometricMeans, KendallsTauRankCorrelation, Likelihoods, ListOfCorrectlyPredictedInstances, MeanSquaredError, Precision, Recall, RelativeError, SpearmansRhoRankCorrelation, Specificity, StandardCorrelationCoefficient, TrueNegatives, TruePositives, YoudensIndex
public interface ClassificationQualityMetricCalculatorInterface
extends MetricCalculatorInterface

Methods which calculate metrics based on classification results and ground truth information should implement this interface.

Version:
$Id: ClassificationQualityMetricCalculatorInterface.java 1084 2010-07-01 14:08:28Z vatolkin $
Author:
Igor Vatolkin

calculateMetric

ValidationMetric[] calculateMetric(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> groundTruthRelationships,
                                   java.util.ArrayList<ClassifiedSongPartitionsDescription> predictedRelationships)
                                   throws NodeException
Calculates the metric

Parameters:
groundTruthRelationships - Ground truth relationships of classifier input (labeled relationships)
classifierRelationships - Relationships calculated by classifier (predicted relationships)
Returns:
Metric or null if this calculator does not support required classifiers
Throws:
NodeException

Parameters:
groundTruthRelationships - Binary ground truth relationships of classifier input (labeled relationships)
classifierRelationships - Binary relationships calculated by classifier (predicted relationships)
Returns:

NodeException
